description: Developed and customized Shopify themes for B2B, consumer brands, and subscription services using third-party apps, JavaScript libraries, and Shopify's APIs. Integrated tools like ReCharge, Rebuy, Klaviyo, Yotpo, and Okendo while ensuring top-notch accessibility and usability through comprehensive UI/UX/ADA testing with Lambda, PopeTech, and manual methods.

Led a web redesign for an enterprise ERP software company that increased page impressions by 2,000+ per month and added translation services for thousands of visitors. Built accessibility features for 3,500 users with responsive layouts and custom WordPress components and developed a scalable design system in Figma for consistent, engaging user experiences.

Created a web app to measure social network behaviors and research efforts, uncovering insights into multi-million dollar revenue streams. Partnered with departments to refine data manipulation and processing techniques using HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Python, and Pandas, and led post-implementation reviews to enhance transparency and accessibility.
